description.overview: kjnodes is trusted Proof of Stake validator across Cosmos universe. Active ecosystem contributor, IBC relayer and chain service provider since 2021.
description.team: We deliver top-notch secure and reliable infrastructure for Cosmos projects. That includes highly available, load-balanced RPC archive nodes, RPC nodes and more. 24/7 monitoring with no user fund slashing since the inception. We protect our delegators by offering 100% refund on downtime slash.
